resources.string: What is Ufone Biz Store Service all about?

Ufone Biz Store is an SMS and Mobile Application based service which provides a platform to view best Deals & Discounts on Top Brands in Pakistan. With major brands on-board ranging from fashion & lifestyle to health & fitness, Shopping, Restaurants and much more, Biz Store has it All!\n\nUfone Biz Store also offers a variety of Exclusive Deals available to BizStore users only who can later avail them from the respective stores/outlets via discount redemption process.
What do I get from Ufone Biz Store?

Ufone Biz Store users get Exclusive Deals & Discounts along with latest updates of the related categories. The user can also search any business of their liking and get the contact details. The categories for which deals & updates are offered are as follows: 
		1. Top Deals 
		2. Food Deals 
		3. Shopping and Fashion 
		4. Ladies Section 
		5. Health and Fitness 
		6. Education 
		7. Entertainment
How can a user subscribe to Ufone Biz Store?
User can subscribe to Ufone Biz Store via either of the two mediums:

1. SMS: User must send “SUB” to 5005. Once sent, the user will get a message confirming successful subscription. User will be charged Rs. 2.5 + tax/week as subscription price. However, if the user has already subscribed to the service through Smartphone Application, he will not be charged again.

2. Smart Phone Application: 
		i. User downloads the Bizstore smartphone application from Ufone App Store. 
		ii. User enters his Ufone Mobile Number to login. 
		iii. On successful login, he becomes the subscriber and is charged Rs. 2.5 + tax/week for the service. 
	iv. However, in case the user has already subscribed to the service through SMS, he will not be charged again.
What are the Smartphone Application Charges?
Upon successful application installation & login, the user will be charged are Rs. 2.5 + tax/Week. However, the user is not charged on downloading the smartphone application.
How can a User Redeem Exclusive Deals?
The User can redeem the deal through following steps:
Step 1: User views the deal on APP. \nStep 2: User will have to click on Redeem Deal Button. (Only for Exclusive Deals) \nStep 3: User will have to enter merchant code.
i. Merchant can enter the code for User on their mobile. \nii. Merchant can share the code with User. \niii. Merchant codes will be put on display in their shops and User can enter it himself.
How can a user Unsubscribe from this service?

User can deactivate the service by simply clicking on ‘Unsubscribe’ button from Main Menu given on the home screen. Once done, the user will have to login again if he wishes to use the smartphone application.
Please enter a valid Ufone Mobile Number
Hi, I just found this great App for you called Ufone Biz Store. You can find businesses and enjoy the best deals & discounts in your city. Send SUB to 5005 to download the Application.
© Copyright 2016 Ufone BizStore Application\nAll rights reserved.
Dear User, you have successfully unsubscribed from Ufone BizStore!
You have successfully signed in on Ufone BizStore.\nFind popular venues, great local businesses,\nDiscover discounts, products & services closest to you, wherever you are!
Ufone BizStore app will send a one time sms to verify your phone number.
You have been Unsubscribed from Ufone BizStore
Awesome! BizStore saved you money on the best deal in town. You will receive a discount confirmation message shortly.
By logging out of Ufone BizStore, you will no longer get promotion or service alerts from application.
